title: Generative Audio Engine
description: Real-time soundscapes driven by environmental data inputs.
longDescription: An exploration into sonifying weather patterns using the Web Audio API. This experiment connects to live weather APIs to modulate oscillator parameters, creating an ever-changing ambient soundscape that reflects current conditions in Tokyo.

title: eInk Home Dashboard
description: Low-power definition of home automation control.
longDescription: A custom ESP32-based controller driving a 7.5-inch eInk display. Serves as a central hub for home assistant, showing transit times, weather, and energy usage with weeks of battery life.

title: Obsidian Research Agent
description: LLM-powered plugin for semantic search within personal notes.
longDescription: A plugin for Obsidian that indexes local markdown vaults into a vector database, allowing for semantic queries and 'chat with your notes' functionality completely offline using local LLMs.
